mods.abstract: WSM presentation of Magnolia Blossoms (NBC not mentioned). Originally broadcast 1940-05-05, part 1. Features performances by the Fisk Jubilee Singers led by Mrs James Myers (Henrietta Myers), and an orchestra led by Pietro Brescia.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
